results.name: a(n) = total number of nodes in the finite subtrees branching "left" (to the "smaller side") from node n in the infinite trunk (A259934) of the tree generated by edge-relation A049820(child) = parent.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8107
formula: (Here [ ] stands for Iverson bracket, giving as its result 1 only when A049820(k) = A259934(n), and 0 otherwise).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 04 2015
